title: Add Admin Panel control link to Navbar

requirements.summary: Display 'Admin Panel' navigation link in Navbar for authenticated admin users only, styled with gold accent color and navigating to /admin/dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as an admin user, the Navbar shows an 'Admin Panel' link.
The link is styled with gold/amber accent color consistent with the existing theme.
Non-admin authenticated users do not see the 'Admin Panel' link.
Unauthenticated users do not see the 'Admin Panel' link.
The link is visible on every page (Navbar mounted at root layout level).

file_operations.description: Add conditional rendering of 'Admin Panel' link based on user authentication and admin role. Use the useAuth hook from AuthContext to check authentication state and the backend actor's isCallerAdmin method (or userProfile.role === 'admin') to verify admin status. Insert the link between the authenticated nav items and the coin balance display. Style the link with gold/amber accent color (text-amber-400 hover:text-amber-300) to match the existing theme. Ensure the link navigates to /admin/dashboard using the router Link component and is only visible when the user is authenticated and has admin role.
